snippet: A full appellate court indicated Wednesday that it will not rehear an appeal of the corruption convictions of former Gov. Rod Blagojevich of Illinois.
abstract: Former Illinois Gov Rod Blagojevich is denied rehearing by US Appellate court on his corruption convictions.
lead_paragraph: A full appellate court indicated Wednesday that it will not rehear an appeal of the corruption convictions of former Gov. Rod Blagojevich of Illinois.

headline.main: Illinois: Court Refuses to Rehear Former Governor’s Case
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Court Refuses to Rehear Ex-governor’s Case
